member.name: T:ProjectEntities.DynamicType
member.summary: Defines the type class of entity class .

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.DynamicType.DieObjects
member.summary: The collection of actions to process when Die() method is called.
member.remarks: Usually Die() method is used to destroy the object with ability to do actions such as creation of a new objects, play sound, etc.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.UnitType.AllowPlayerControl
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates, whether the unit can be controlled by the player.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.UnitType.InitialAI
member.summary: Gets or sets a artificial intellect which will be appointed to a unit at its creation.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.UnitType.ViewRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the radius of visibility of a unit.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.UnitType.FPSCameraOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the camera offset which will be considered at a FPS mode.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.DifferentialFrontRearSplit
member.summary: Ratio of torque split between front and rear (more than 0.5 means more to front, less than 0.5 means more to rear). Only applied to LimitedSlipAllWheelDrive and OpenAllWheelDrive differential types.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.DifferentialFrontLeftRightSplit
member.summary: Ratio of torque split between front-left and front-right (more than 0.5 means more to front-left, less than 0.5 means more to front-right). Only applied to LimitedSlipAllWheelDrive, OpenAllWheelDrive and LimitedSlipFrontWheelDrive differential types.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.DifferentialRearLeftRightSplit
member.summary: Ratio of torque split between rear-left and rear-right (more than 0.5 means more to rear-left, less than 0.5 means more to rear-right). Only applied to LimitedSlipAllWheelDrive, OpenAllWheelDrive and LimitedSlipRearWheelDrive differential types.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.DifferentialCenterBias
member.summary: Maximum allowed ratio of average front wheel rotation speed and rear wheel rotation speeds. Only applied to LimitedSlipAllWheelDrive differential types.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.DifferentialFrontBias
member.summary: Maximum allowed ratio of front-left and front-right wheel rotation speeds. Only applied to LimitedSlipAllWheelDrive and LimitedSlipFrontWheelDrive differential types.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.DifferentialRearBias
member.summary: Maximum allowed ratio of rear-left and rear-right wheel rotation speeds. Only applied to LimitedSlipAllWheelDrive and LimitedSlipRearWheelDrive differential types.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.EnginePeakTorque
member.summary: Maximum torque available to apply to the engine, specified in Nm. Please note that to optimize the implementation the engine has a hard-coded inertia of 1kgm^2. As a consequence the magnitude of the engine's angular acceleration is exactly equal to the magnitude of the torque driving the engine. To simulate engines with different inertias (!=1kgm^2) adjust either the entries of EngineTorqueCurve or EnginePeakTorque accordingly.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.EngineMaxRPM
member.summary: Maximum rotation speed of the engine, specified in revolutions per minute (RPM).

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.EngineDampingRateFullThrottle
member.summary: Damping rate of engine in s^-1 when full throttle is applied. Damping rate applied at run-time is an interpolation between EngineDampingRateZeroThrottleClutchEngaged and EngineDampingRateFullThrottle if the clutch is engaged. If the clutch is disengaged (in neutral gear) the damping rate applied at run-time is an interpolation between EngineDampingRateZeroThrottleClutchDisengaged and EngineDampingRateFullThrottle.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.EngineDampingRateZeroThrottleClutchEngaged
member.summary: Damping rate of engine in s^-1 at zero throttle when the clutch is engaged. Damping rate applied at run-time is an interpolation between EngineDampingRateZeroThrottleClutchEngaged and EngineDampingRateFullThrottle if the clutch is engaged. If the clutch is disengaged (in neutral gear) the damping rate applied at run-time is an interpolation between EngineDampingRateZeroThrottleClutchDisengaged and EngineDampingRateFullThrottle.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.EngineDampingRateZeroThrottleClutchDisengaged
member.summary: Damping rate of engine in s^-1 at zero throttle when the clutch is disengaged (in neutral gear). Damping rate applied at run-time is an interpolation between EngineDampingRateZeroThrottleClutchEngaged and EngineDampingRateFullThrottle if the clutch is engaged. If the clutch is disengaged (in neutral gear) the damping rate applied at run-time is an interpolation between EngineDampingRateZeroThrottleClutchDisengaged and EngineDampingRateFullThrottle.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.EngineTorqueCurve
member.summary: Graph of normalized torque (torque/maxTorque) against normalized engine revs (revs/maxRevs).

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.GearsSwitchTime
member.summary: Time it takes to switch gear, specified in seconds.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.ClutchStrength
member.summary: Strength of clutch. Torque generated by clutch is proportional to the clutch strength and the velocity difference between the engine speed and the speed of the driven wheels after accounting for the gear ratio.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.AckermannSteerAccuracy
member.summary: Accuracy of Ackermann steer calculation. Accuracy with value 0.0f results in no Ackermann steer-correction. Accuracy with value 1.0 results in perfect Ackermann steer-correction.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.SteerVsForwardSpeedTable
member.summary: Table of steer multipliers depending on the forward speed.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.GearItem.Number
member.summary: The number of the gear. Set -1 to for reverse gear, set 0 for neutral gear.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.TireTypeItem.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets type of tire name.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.TireTypeItem.TireWheelItem.TireLatStiffX
member.summary: Tire lateral stiffness is typically a graph of tire load that has linear behaviour near zero load and flattens at large loads. mLatStiffX describes the minimum normalised load (load/restLoad) that gives a flat lateral stiffness response.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.TireTypeItem.TireWheelItem.TireLatStiffY
member.summary: Tire lateral stiffness is a graph of tire load that has linear behavior near zero load and flattens at large loads. TireLatStiffY describes the maximum possible lateral stiffness divided by the rest tire load, specified in "per radian".

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.TireTypeItem.TireWheelItem.TireLongitudinalStiffnessPerUnitGravity
member.summary: Tire Longitudinal stiffness per unit longitudinal slip per unit gravity, specified in N per radian per unit gravitational acceleration Longitudinal stiffness of the tire per unit longitudinal slip is calculated as gravitationalAcceleration * TireLongitudinalStiffnessPerUnitGravity.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.TireTypeItem.TireWheelItem.TireCamberStiffness
member.summary: Camber stiffness, specified in N per radian.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.TireTypeItem.TireWheelItem.FrictionVsSlipGraphZeroLongitudinalSlip
member.summary: Graph of friction vs longitudinal slip with 3 points. This is the friction available at zero longitudinal slip.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.TireTypeItem.TireWheelItem.FrictionVsSlipGraphLongitudinalSlipWithMaximumFriction
member.summary: Graph of friction vs longitudinal slip with 3 points. This is the value of longitudinal slip with maximum friction.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.TireTypeItem.TireWheelItem.FrictionVsSlipGraphMaximumFriction
member.summary: Graph of friction vs longitudinal slip with 3 points. This is the maximum friction.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.TireTypeItem.TireWheelItem.FrictionVsSlipGraphEndPointOfGraph
member.summary: Graph of friction vs longitudinal slip with 3 points. This is the end point of the graph.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.TireTypeItem.TireWheelItem.FrictionVsSlipGraphValueOfFrictionForSlipsGreaterThanEndPointOfGraph
member.summary: Graph of friction vs longitudinal slip with 3 points. This is the value of friction for slips greater than end point of the graph.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.TireTypeItem.FrictionMultiplierItem.SurfaceMaterialName
member.summary: Gets or sets physical material of the surface. If you specify an empty string, the value will be used for all materials which are not specified in this list.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.WheelItem.WheelMaxBrakeTorque
member.summary: Max brake torque that can be applied to wheel, specified in Nm.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.WheelItem.WheelMaxHandBrakeTorque
member.summary: Max handbrake torque that can be applied to wheel, specified in Nm.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.WheelItem.WheelMaxSteer
member.summary: Max steer angle that can be achieved by the wheel, specified in degrees.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.WheelItem.WheelToeAngle
member.summary: Wheel toe angle, specified in degrees.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.WheelItem.SuspensionSpringStrength
member.summary: Spring strength of suspension unit, specified in N m^-1.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.WheelItem.SuspensionSpringDamperRate
member.summary: Spring damper rate of suspension unit, specified in s^-1.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.WheelItem.SuspensionMaxCompression
member.summary: Maximum compression allowed by suspension spring, specified in m.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.WheelItem.SuspensionMaxDroop
member.summary: Maximum elongation allowed by suspension spring, specified in m.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.WheelItem.SuspensionSprungMassCoefficient
member.summary: Mass of vehicle that is supported by suspension spring, specified in coefficient of the chassis mass.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.WheelItem.SuspensionForceApplicationPointOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the application point of the suspension force of the suspension of the wheel. Specified relative to the centre of the wheel.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.CarType.WheelItem.TireForceApplicationPointOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the application point of the tire force of the tire of the wheel. Specified relative to the centre of the wheel.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Unit
member.summary: Units differ from objects that that can be controlled by intellect ().

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Dynamic
member.summary: Defines a class based on MapObject with additional functionality which usually useful to use in the project.
member.remarks: Features: - Health system. The object can lose all health and die. - Ability to configure set of actions to execute at object destroying. As example: Create particle system, new object, play sound. - Playing sound at physical collision with another object. - Managing of incluences. The object can have set of attached influences. As example the object can take fire. - Networking support: Synchronization position, rotation of physical bodies.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.Unit.InitialAI
member.summary: Gets or sets a artificial intelligence which will be appointed to a unit at its creation.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Intellect
member.summary: This takes the form of either AI (Artificial Intelligence) or player control over a unit .

remarks.para: There is inherit AI base base for an computer-controlled intellect. For example, there is the class which is designed for the management of a game character.
Control by a live player () is achieved through the commands of pressed keys or the mouse for control of the unit or turret.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Crane
member.summary: Gives an opportunity of creation of the crane and his control via .

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Turret
member.summary: Gives an opportunity of creation of the turrets. A turret can be rotated. Guns are attached on the tower and player can control the aiming and shooting of the turret.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Switch
member.summary: Base class for defines the user switches. (Booleans and quantitatives).

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.WaterPlaneClipVolume
member.summary: Addition class for WaterPlane. By this class is possible to disable reflections for objects inside specified volume.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.SimpleMapType
member.summary: Defines the entity type. Used for preview types in the Resource Editor.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Influence
member.summary: Influences are effects on objects. For example, the ability to burn a monster, is implemented through the use of influences.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.JigsawPuzzlePiece
member.summary: The piece for puzzle game example.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.JigsawPuzzleManager
member.summary: The pieces manager for puzzle game example.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.ExampleMagicObjectType.BlinkMaterialName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of a replacing material.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.CutSceneManager
member.summary: The manager of cut scenes. That there was an opportunity to create a cut scenes on a map, it is necessary to create in the Map Editor object "CutSceneManager".

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.DynamicCollision
member.summary: Represents creation of dynamic obstacles. By means of this class it is possible to set limiting area of movings for map objects.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.DoorType.OpenDoorBodyOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the displacement a position of a body "door" when the door is open.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.DoorType.OpenDoor2BodyOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the displacement a position of a body "door2" when the door is open.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.DoorType.OpenTime
member.summary: Gets or set the time of opening/closing of a door.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.DoorType.SoundOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets the sound at opening a door.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.DoorType.SoundClose
member.summary: Gets or sets the sound at closing a door.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Door
member.summary: Defines the doors. That doors worked, it is necessary that the physical model had a body with a name "door". This body will move at change of a status of a door.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.Door.Opened
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the door is currently open.

member.name: M:ProjectEntities.BulletType.CalculateDemandedVerticalAngleToHitTarget(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Calculates the demanded vertical angle to hit the target. Works only for bullet types with enabled Gravity.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.BulletType.HitObjects
member.summary: The collection of actions to process when bullet hit another body.
member.remarks: The developer can configure actions such as creation of a new objects, play sound, etc.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Bullet
member.summary: Defines a class for bullet simulation.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.BulletItemType.BulletType
member.summary: Gets or sets the bullets type.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.BulletItemType.BulletCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the bullets count.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.BulletItemType.BulletType2
member.summary: Gets or sets the bullets type.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.BulletItemType.BulletCount2
member.summary: Gets or sets the bullets count.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.BulletItem
member.summary: Represents a item of the weapon bullets. When the player take this item it takes a specified bullets.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Item
member.summary: Items which can be picked up by units. Med-kits, weapons, ammunition.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Corpse
member.summary: Gives an opportunity to create corpses. A difference of a corpse from usual object that he changes the orientation depending on a surface. Also the class operates animations.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Weapon
member.summary: Defines the weapons. Both hand-held by characters or guns established on turret are weapons.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.MapChangeRegion
member.summary: Gives an opportunity of moving of the player between maps. When the player gets in this region game loads a new map.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.MapChangeRegion.MapName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of a map for loading.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.MapChangeRegion.SpawnPointName
member.summary: Gets or set the name of a spawn point in the destination map.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Explosion
member.summary: An invisible blast wave which damages and increases the impulse of physical models within a radius.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Faction
member.summary: Concept of the command. Opponents with an artificial intelligences attack units of another's fraction.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Fan
member.remarks: It is necessary that in physical model there was a with a name "bladesMotor".

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.Fan.ForceMaximum
member.summary: Gets or sets the the maximal pushing force.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.Fan.Throttle
member.summary: Gets or sets the current power.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.GameMap.GameType
member.remarks: By default, you can choose several options such as: Action, RTS, TPSArcade, TurrentDemo, VillageDemo and others. Each type differs by common logic and features of the interaction with the player. Developers can add their own types of maps.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.GameMap.GameMusic
member.summary: The file name of the background music.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.GameMap.WindDirection
member.remarks: At the moment this parameter is used only for animating vegetation materials (Vegetation material).

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.GameMap.WindSpeed
member.remarks: At the moment this parameter is used only for animating vegetation materials (Vegetation material).

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.GameMap.PlayerUnitType
member.summary: The type of object that will be used when creating a player.
member.remarks: Usually if the parameter is not specified, by default a character of a girl is created (Types\Units\Girl\Girl.type).

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.GameMap.ResetYCoordinateForDynamicBodies
member.summary: A value indicating whether the two-dimensional calculation mode physics enabled.
member.remarks: After activating this parameter, the position of physical bodies on the Y axis will be reset to zero.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.GameMap.DestroyObjectsBelowHeight
member.summary: Height below which all objects will be removed.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Substance
member.summary: Defines possible substances of objects. Substances are necessary for work of influences (). The certain influences operate only on the set substances.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.MapObjectSceneGraphGroups
member.summary: User defined scene graph groups for MapObjects.

remarks.para: These objects will be created after fire.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.WeaponItemType.WeaponType
member.summary: Gets or sets the item weapon type.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.WeaponItem
member.summary: Represents a item of the weapon. When the player take this item it takes a specified weapon.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.HealthItem
member.summary: Defines a class for item with ability to heal the unit. When the player takes the item his increased.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.JumpPad
member.summary: Gives an opportunity of creation a jump pads.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.PlayerIntellect.Instance
member.summary: In networking mode each client will have different instance. Reference to the his intellect.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.Teleporter
member.summary: Defines the teleporter for transfering objects.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.Teleporter.Active
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the teleporter is currently active.

member.name: P:ProjectEntities.Teleporter.Destination
member.summary: Gets or sets the destination teleporter.

member.name: T:ProjectEntities.PhysicalStream
member.summary: Defines the physics streams. You can create steam, fiery streams, etc.

member.summary: Defines the parametrical switch which turns the .
